properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.service
properties.description: the service name to register, default value is ${spring.application.name}.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.namingLoadCacheAtStart
properties.description: naming load from local cache at application start .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.watch.enabled
properties.description: enable nacos discovery watch or not .
